base_description: Purple L-shaped faucet with a modern design.
part_description: Comprises a cylindrical base and a horizontal spout, both purple. The cylindrical base is vertical, supporting the horizontal spout, which extends outward. A small nozzle is located at the end of the spout.
internal_interaction_description: The cylindrical base supports the weight and structure of the faucet, allowing water to flow through internal channels to the spout. The nozzle at the end of the spout regulates water flow, ensuring a steady stream when operated. The design allows for smooth water passage from base to spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet interacts with plumbing systems to deliver water when turned on. It is typically mounted on sinks or countertops, allowing users to control water flow for washing or cleaning tasks. The modern design complements contemporary bathroom or kitchen decor.
